column4: i there, i am totally new to ubuntu, can someone give me a hand to figure out how to use some wine stuff?
http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/wine
did u check if u application work in wine website appdatabase
go and check status of ur application here http://appdb.winehq.org/ must every app work with wine?
check here on wine website http://appdb.winehq.org/
seems ur app doesnt not exist in wine app database , u better try at ur own now , wine app is user driven database u can submit this problem this is how u can help wine work for u
which wine version u have? ubuntu repo offer old wine version u need to add xtra repos
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list then add this # Repository for wine
did u add wine repo
r u  trying to install window base USB driver through wine?
did ubuntu not detect ur USB drive?
did ubuntu not detect ur USB drive?
just connect usb flash drive ubuntu should detect it u wud c usb drive on ur desktop icon
do this command in terminal lsusb
lsusb
driver wont work through wine , use this command and tell me lsusb
lsusb
this command wud help u c if ur usb drive really mounted /detected
is usb pluged in?
it does not , u better better use other socket change it physically
Bus 001 Device 002: ID 0403:fa24 Future Technology Devices International, Ltd this mesg mean usb drive is detected
open file browser and u can get into this drive wats a big deal?
